feed.title: ACE Lab
feed.subtitle: The Johns Hopkins Autonomous Control & Exploration Lab

entry.title: Jgcd25
entry.content: Our paper on Principled Stochastic Trajectory Planning for Asteroid Reconnaissance was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!
entry.summary: Our paper on Principled Stochastic Trajectory Planning for Asteroid Reconnaissance was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!

entry.title: Jgcd25
entry.content: Our paper on Constraint-Informed Learning for Warm Starting Trajectory Optimization was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!
entry.summary: Our paper on Constraint-Informed Learning for Warm Starting Trajectory Optimization was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!

entry.title: Jgcd25
entry.content: Our paper on Transformer-Based Tight Constraint Prediction for Efficient Powered Descent Guidance was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!
entry.summary: Our paper on Transformer-Based Tight Constraint Prediction for Efficient Powered Descent Guidance was accepted into Journal of Guidance, Control, and Dynamics (JGCD)!

entry.title: Scitech25
entry.content: Congratulations to Kazu Echigo for being a AIAA SciTech GNC Graduate Paper competition finalist for our paper on stochastic optimal control!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Kazu Echigo for being a AIAA SciTech GNC Graduate Paper competition finalist for our paper on stochastic optimal control!

entry.title: Faculty
entry.content: Excited to announce that I’ll be joining Johns Hopkins Mechanical Engineering as an assistant professor starting in July 2025!
entry.summary: Excited to announce that I’ll be joining Johns Hopkins Mechanical Engineering as an assistant professor starting in July 2025!

entry.title: Ram22
entry.content: Our paper on testing gecko adhesives on the ISS was awarded the IEEE Robotics and Automation Magazine Best Paper Award!
entry.summary: Our paper on testing gecko adhesives on the ISS was awarded the IEEE Robotics and Automation Magazine Best Paper Award!
